mapper.insert: INSERT INTO room ( room_id, host_user_email, title, content, gender, max_participants, status, categoryId, start_date, exam_date, deadline, ended_at, hostUserNickname, room_img, created_at ) VALUES ( #{roomId}, #{hostUserEmail}, #{title}, #{content}, #{gender}, #{maxParticipants}, 'OPEN', #{categoryId}, #{startDate}, #{examDate}, #{deadline}, #{endDate}, #{hostUserNickname}, #{roomImg}, NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT room_id AS roomId, host_user_email AS hostUserEmail, hostUserNickname, title, content, gender, max_participants AS maxParticipants, status, categoryId, start_date AS startDate, ended_at AS endDate, exam_date AS examDate, deadline, room_img AS roomImg, created_at AS createdAt FROM room ORDER BY created_at DESC

SELECT room_id AS roomId, host_user_email AS hostUserEmail, hostUserNickname, title, content, gender, max_participants AS maxParticipants, status, categoryId, start_date AS startDate, ended_at AS endDate, exam_date AS examDate, deadline, room_img AS roomImg, created_at AS createdAt FROM room WHERE room_id = #{roomId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM room_join_request WHERE room_id = #{roomId} AND status = '승인'
mapper.update: UPDATE room SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, gender = #{gender}, max_participants = #{maxParticipants}, categoryId = #{categoryId}, start_date = #{startDate}, ended_at = #{endDate}, exam_date = #{examDate}, deadline = #{deadline}, hostUserNickname = #{hostUserNickname}, room_img = #{roomImg}, status = #{status} WHERE room_id = #{roomId}
